nodes.bodyText: Check with @alexshtin . I'm surprised that it works with Thrift API of the temporal service (unless it was renamed on the server side as well.)
Yes, it is still cadence-frontend there. I wouldn't rename it because it will be gone after gRPC migration.
Is "uber" supposed to become "temporal" here as well?
Yes, I believe it is OK. Check with @alexshtin to see if this string is hardcoded anywhere in the service code.
Actually they are. Let's leave it as is and file an issue to rename them later altogether.
Revert as the issue is still in the cadence repo.
